trends: There have been 2 other sightings in longs
There were no other sightings in longs on or around October 24th 2012
divs: sighting detailswe have been seeing many orange orb like lights in the sky mainly over the ocean.this has been going on since mid july and again we watched them tonight. i have put one report on mufons site back in mid july but since then i havnt reported anything on ths site. however they are here again tonight and they are getting lower and closer. i have seen these at very close distances and they are not anything i have ever seen before. they light up brilliantly then fade out and another will do the same in a different location then after 4-6 of these do it they will travell together flashing a bright white light then do it all over again somewhere else. many people are seeing these here and i wish someone out there could help us. the local military base and f.a.a. claim nothing going on here when clearly we are seeing something. i have put many videos on youtube regarding these orange lights. just search [video title removed\cms\tg] and you will see what im talking about. specifically september 13,2012. i have day video night video, pictures. please someone out there with answers step foward we need answers!!!!!! [email removed\cms\tg] is my email if anyone has any benificial info this is getting rediculous.
